page.title: 02WHITMUIR HALL
page.content: We were allowed to go to the south common and we visited whitmuir house,here is some of the information we found out about it. The whitmuir house is very old the grounds around the house are kept in very good condition. The court house around the corner was built in 1907 and has been all renovated. There are hardly any other houses near Whitmuir. The farm land is used for grazing and crops. None off the houses are used for residential houses. All the transport around here is farm machinery as there are no buses that run up these back roads. The road which leads up to the Hall is lined with Beech trees.
